text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Oh, huh!? When did you get back……?! ……―No, that's not it!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: H-hmph! That instructor put you up to this, huh?!
choice_data_list: No, I want to know more about you
No, I want to know more about you

text_block_list.text: I had misunderstood her because I didn't know anything about Shinko Windy. When I think about it, I never properly spoke with her even once.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: You can't fool me, you probably――…… huh?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……You want to know more about Windy-chan?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …………Hmmmmm. ……Well, if you're that desperate.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: All of it!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Shi shi shi! You're such a hopeless person! Then you better listen up, to the saga of Windy-chan!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Ever since she was born, Windy-chan has always been amazing!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: My dad and my mom, and all the employees at our company, everyone would praise Windy-chan!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Mom
text_block_list.text: Oh, Windy-chan! How can you eat those sweets in such a cute way!? You must be a genius～!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Dad
text_block_list.text: Ha Ha Ha, Windy is always lively and running around! You're a world-class treasure!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: But…… in kindergarten I found out…… that this world, is really strange!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: It's strange! When I'm eating food, waking up after a nap, or putting on my shoes, nobody praises me!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: No matter what I do, nobody will look at me!!
Isn't that normal? I held back from saying those words…… I decided to stay quiet and keep listening.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: No matter how I think about it, it's really weird! Even though Windy-chan is the number one existence in this world……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's why, since I had no choice, I had to stand out on my own! Watching their reactions, trying all kinds of things, and then――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Surprising everyone, and being the focus of attention! The ultimate existence that even heroes would chase after!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Gaooo-! So I decided to become a devilish fiend!
As I thought, Shinko Windy's reasons for causing mischief were 『I want to stand out』 and 『I want to be the focus of attention』.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: I really really went wild, and the pranks were really fun! ……but, I realized that that alone wasn't enough.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: If it's just pranks, then everyone gets bored really fast. If I want them to focus on me much, much, muuuuuch longer, it's not good enough!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's why I went around to a lot of places…… and went to a place where there was a lot of cheering!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And she crosses the goal first! She managed to claim a brilliant victory!
(Waaaaaaaahー!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: A-amazing, everyone, everyone, eeeeeveryone! Is only…… focusing on them!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's the place that Windy-chan belongs! It's shiny! The cheers are so loud!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's why, Windy-chan is going to enter the Twinkle Series! To become the most amazing Uma Musume there!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Hmph! This place is strange! Compared to before, there are less people watching me!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ………… Fast ones, strong ones, amazing ones.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Of course, Windy-chan is more amazing than them! But, but…… they're…… pretty amazing too.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …………I didn't know about anyone like that.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……～～～ annoying! Annoying! Annoying!! I-if it's like this……!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Then someone like Windy-chan is……!!
……Tracen Academy is a school where geniuses gather. It's a place that shatters the hearts of Uma Musume that have confidence in themselves.
It's something that will slowly whittle away at you until it's too late. The escalation of her pranks was a call for help――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's why I've decided! I'm quitting!
Before I realized it, I grabbed her arm.
Even though I had misunderstood…… it was undeniable that her pranks were a result of her desire for attention.
If she could strengthen herself through training, then her results would be different. That things had gotten this bad was partially my fault.
It's not like she's lacking in talent. If things go well, then she should be able to run happily again. I wondered if I could help her with that――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: W-……what's with you? You don't want Windy-chan to quit?
With that response, I saw an opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Wha――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: What are you saying all of a sudden――
choice_data_list: I'm looking forward to your future!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Fufu, Kuu kuu kuu kuu!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Waa ha ha ha ha ha ha! Waa ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's right, that's right, that's right! Windy-chan is amazing, cool, and the best and strongest!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's why, in the next race, for sure……!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Fufuun, you got that right!!
